DOC.criteria: Only accept participant Boston , Massachusetts area Age 21 75 , male female Willingness eat prescribe diet 4 week prior infusion date , 3.5 day infusion date Willingness participate infusion protocol , require stay Center Clinical Investigation ( CCI ) one night return blood draw every day next 3 day . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2535 Kg/m2 HDL < 45 mg/dL men , < 55 mg/dL woman Hematocrit < 33 Lowdensity Lipoprotein ( LDL ) cholesterol > 190 mg/dl HDL cholesterol < 20 mg/dl , exclude rare genetic HDL deficiency syndrome Fasting Triglycerides > 500 mg/dl exclude risk pancreatitis ApoE genotype , E2E2 , E2E4 , E4E4 .
